text: If there a way create entire pages based on a HubDB table? So I have a HubDB table for products and I want each product to have it's own page, the page's contents is all stored in the HubDB.

<@U02NJACH5QS> Thanks for the reply Michele, I've seen that page before, and that is kinda the reason for my question. I know you can dynamically generate content for pages, but can you dynamically create entire standalone Website pages

Yep! Maybe I’m misunderstanding, but I think what you’re describing is precisely what a dynamic page is - one main page with a HubDB table listing (like <http://example.com/table|example.com/table>), and then dynamically generated child pages for each row (like <http://example.com/table/row1|example.com/table/row1>).

You’ve probably seen this before too, but if you check out the coding portions, it might help. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/dynamic-pages/hubdb>
